Dreadplague: I will transmit the coordinates now. (She touches her 
armored skin and transmits the data.) I need one of your men now, 
though. We cannot proceed without, and time is short.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "Where will be the location of the gun???"asked Hydras
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Dreadplague: We are starting to build our defense system against 
> > Unicron - I assume you were smart enough to deduce it was he - so 
> we 
> > need your troops to help build it.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Hydras::
> > > 
> > > "Tell it"hissed the male while heappeared.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > Dreadplague was still beating her massive wings in front of 
the 
> > > > Black Fortress. Once again, she roared.
> > > > 
> > > > Dreadplague: Hydras! Hear me, for I deliver a message from 
> > Tyrael, 
> > > > my commander.
